concept.title: PDF
concept.shortdesc: The pdf transformation generates output in Portable Document Format.

conbody.p: This transformation was originally created as a plug-in and maintained outside of the main toolkit code. It was created as a more robust alternative to the demo PDF transformation in the original toolkit, and thus was known as PDF2. The plug-in was bundled into the default toolkit distribution with release 1.4.3.
To run the PDF transformation, set the transtype parameter to pdf, or pass the --format=pdf option to the dita command line.
